word: The question is asked, "Will a man rob God?" and the reply comes, just as it will come from the conference over which you have presided, "Wherein have we robbed thee?" The answer comes from God's messenger, "In tithes and offerings. Ye are cursed with a curse: . . . even this whole nation" (Malachi 3:8). The same sacred obligation rests upon you and upon the people.
